mapper.insert: insert into contract_work (cw_id,cj_contract_code,cj_contract_name,prj_code, contract_name_jia,contract_money, end_money,prj_text,gq_text, prj_charge_man,work_text, rating,type, prj_manager,deputy_prj_manager1,deputy_prj_manager2,prj_general,prj_duration,prj_duration_end,prj_grade,cj_contract_end_time,xm_jindu_piancha,cj_contract_long_time) values (#{work.cwId},#{work.cjContractCode},#{work.cjContractName}, #{work.prjCode}, #{work.contractNameJia},#{work.contractMoney},#{work.endMoney},#{work.prjText},#{work.gqText}, #{work.prjChargeMan},#{work.workText},#{work.rating}, #{work.type},#{work.prjManager},#{work.deputyPrjManager1},#{work.deputyPrjManager2}, #{work.prjGeneral},#{work.prjDuration},#{work.prjDurationEnd},#{work.prjGrade},#{work.cjContractEndTime},#{work.xmJinduPiancha},#{work.cjContractLongTime})
mapper.select: select a.*,f.StarterName as starterName,b.status as status,group_concat(t.om_name SEPARATOR ',') as om_name from contract_work as a LEFT join mode_status as b on a.cw_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT mode_id,StarterName from (SELECT * from flowhistroy order by do_date ASC) f LEFT JOIN contract_work a ON a.cw_id=f.mode_id GROUP BY mode_id ) AS f on a.cw_id=f.mode_id LEFT JOIN (select * from task t left join mode_status b on t.prj_id=b.mode_id left join organization_management c on t.main_department=c.om_id WHERE b.status='2' and t.history=1 ) t ON FIND_IN_SET(t.prj_no,a.prj_code) where (b.status=1 or b.status=2 or b.status=3) and a.type=#{type} GROUP BY a.cw_id
select a.*,c.contract_end_time,c.contract_long_time,c.contract_start_time from contract_work a LEFT JOIN cj_contract c ON a.cj_contract_code=c.contract_no where a.cw_id=#{id} limit 1
select a.end_money from contract_work as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.cw_id=b.mode_id where cj_contract_code=#{no} and type=#{type} and b.status=2
mapper.update: update contract_work set cj_contract_code=#{work.cjContractCode}, cj_contract_name=#{work.cjContractName}, prj_code=#{work.prjCode}, contract_name_jia=#{work.contractNameJia}, contract_money=#{work.contractMoney}, end_money=#{work.endMoney}, prj_charge_man=#{work.prjChargeMan}, rating=#{work.rating}, prj_manager=#{work.prjManager}, deputy_prj_manager1=#{work.deputyPrjManager1}, deputy_prj_manager2=#{work.deputyPrjManager2}, prj_general=#{work.prjGeneral}, prj_duration=#{work.prjDuration}, prj_duration_end=#{work.prjDurationEnd}, prj_grade=#{work.prjGrade}, cj_contract_end_time=#{work.cjContractEndTime}, prj_text=#{work.prjText}, work_text=#{work.workText}, gq_text=#{work.gqText}, xm_jindu_piancha=#{work.xmJinduPiancha}, cj_contract_long_time=#{work.cjContractLongTime} where cw_id=#{work.cwId}

update contract_work set cj_contract_code=#{work.cjContractCode}, cj_contract_name=#{work.cjContractName}, prj_code=#{work.prjCode}, contract_name_jia=#{work.contractNameJia}, contract_money=#{work.contractMoney}, end_money=#{work.endMoney}, prj_text=#{work.prjText}, work_text=#{work.workText}, gq_text=#{work.gqText} where cw_id=#{work.cwId}
